attributes.action: Have a dedicated Hospitality minister in government
attributes.additional_details: Hospitality has been completely used as a scapegoat throughout the pandemic without anyone in government even having a modicum of knowledge or understanding of how the industry works. The industry employs approx 3 million people and provides billions to the UK economy each year. An industry so important to the country deserves a dedicated minister
attributes.background: To make a position for a minister of hospitality in cabinet that understands the industry

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552201
